text: Wim Dik (11 January 1939 - 19 June 2022) was a Dutch politician and businessman. He was the head of Royal PTT Nederland NV. He was a member of Democrats 66 (D66). He was a State Secretary for Economic Affairs in the Third Van Agt cabinet from 1981 to 1982. Dik was born in Rotterdam, Netherlands. Dik died on 19 June 2022 in Rotterdam at the age of 83.Oud-KPN-topman Wim Dik (83) overleden ==References== Category:1939 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Democrats 66 politicians Category:Deputy government ministers of the Netherlands Category:Dutch businesspeople Category:Politicians from Rotterdam
title: Wim Dik
